name: Le Bisou Perle shoulder bag
description: A highlight of the label’s SS23 Le Raphia show in Paris, this Le Bisou Perle shoulder bag demonstrates Jacquemus’ inventive aesthetic. Crafted from supple leather to a curved silhouette, it’s characterised by oversized bead detailing that adorns the shoulder strap.

name: crocodile-embossed shoulder bag
description: This brown BY FAR Rachel leather shoulder bag features a mock croc texture and has been shaped to a slim silhouette. It has silver tone hardware, a top zip opening and a detachable shoulder strap. Let us introduce you to your newest best friend, Rachel. She’s BY FAR your favourite companion.
